group_1.narration: In the end, we returned to the tea party@without any time to resolve the misunderstanding…

group_1.textRight: That was fast! As expected, Miss Nanase.

group_1.textLeft: ...Is that so?

group_1.textRight: I’m sorry for all of this, thank you for bringing@them back.

group_1.textLeft: No worries! It is only a matter of duty as an@officer.

group_1.textRight: ...Miss Nanase, you're so serious and@good-natured at your core.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
Is that so? I’m really not all that serious...

group_1.textRight: No, you are. At least at your core. ...Haven't@you realized?
You think that it’s natural to help someone in@need, don’t you?

group_1.textLeft: Now then...
The two of you, please enjoy the continuation@of the tea party.

group_1.textCenter: Okay, big sis!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, don’t mind them.

group_1.textRight: Miss Nanase, your bag looks very heavy today.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that’s right.
It's the robe I received at the Coordinator's...@[chara:301701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301701:lipSynch_1]Er, I mean, it's something Miss Akatsuki forgot...
That I meant to give back to her.
[chara:301701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh...!?
(“Received at the Coordinator’s”... Why did I@say that just now?)
(I’m this close to remembering something...@Ah, I need to be alone.)
Um... Student President...
I’d like to leave the room for a while.

group_1.textRight: Huh? You’re leaving? Was there something else@to take care of?

group_1.textLeft: I invoke my right to remain silent.
Ah, um... That’s not it.
I, um... have a quick meeting with... the Flower@Arrangement Club head...?

group_1.textRight: Ahh, I see. If that's how it is, I'll play along.
Thank you Miss Nanase. I owe you a ton of@favors, after all.

group_1.textLeft: (She wasn’t fooled in the slightest...!?)

group_1.textCenter: Phew... I managed to be excused.
While I’m alone, I should organize my thoughts.
(After all, a serious memory was just recovered...)

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that’s right.
It's the robe I received at the Coordinator's...@[chara:301701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301701:lipSynch_1]Er, I mean, it's something Miss Akatsuki forgot...
That I meant to give back to her.

group_1.narration: Yeah... Right, the White Feather robe@was something that Miss Akatsuki forgot.
I planned to return it the next time I saw her,@so I took it from the Coordinator’s...
After that, the decisive battle broke out@in Kamihama and I lost my chance!
I can no longer approach her@as a Black Feather, after all.
So I attached a note to the robe,@thinking that I could put it in Miss Akatsuki’s locker.@Then I put it in my bag...!

group_1.textCenter: (How could I have forgotten that until now?)
(Forgot...? No... Is this something different?)
(I remember bringing it this morning, but@there's another memory, too.)
(There I promised dinner with my family.@I'm sure I left home without a robe.)
Without a doubt... That also happened this@morning.
Both scenarios feel perfectly real to me...@But why is my memory doubled?
(It’s as if...)

group_1.narration: In World A, I promised to have dinner@with my family before I left home.
And in World B,@I didn't make that promise,@and grabbed the robe as I left.

group_1.textCenter: (The memories of both worlds are somehow@overlapping...?)
(Wait... What's happening!?)
(Why? Am I... At school!?)
(At that time...)
(Did I set foot from World A into World B?)
(Into another world, like the back side of@the moon...)
(One more thing that I am concerned about...)
(Is that the flow of time has felt awfully slow.)

group_1.textRight: That was fast! As expected, Miss Nanase.

group_1.textLeft: ...Is that so?

group_1.textCenter: (I did all that running around school, and time@has hardly advanced.)
(How do I put this...)
(It feels like time doesn’t want to advance.)
(If the cause is near here...)
(then maybe if I use my Soul Gem, I'll be able@to detect it...?)
Ah-ha!
There's a large magical disturbance by the old@school building...!

group_1.textLeft: Let’s go! Over there!

group_1.textCenter: (Hotorin and Rion ran towards the old building,)
(because they felt a magical reaction!)
...I understand.
I’m going to go to the old school building.@I’ll get to it for sure this time.
